Package edu.cnm.deepdive

Class Frobenius

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.Frobenius
  • public class Frobenius
extends Object
    Incorporates a number of static methods related to the Coin problem and Frobenius numbers. Currently, the implementation focus is on McNugget numbers and variations on that concept, using those problems as a context for exploring practical applications (and pitfalls) of recursion.
    Author:
    Nicholas Bennett & Deep Dive Coding Java Bootcamp Cohort 9.

      Constructors

      Frobenius()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean isGeneralMcNugget​(int value, int[] packSizes)
      Determines if value can be expressed as the sum of non-negative integral multiples of the elements of packSizes.
      static boolean isMcNugget​(int value)
      Determines if value can be expressed as the sum of non-negative integral multiples of 6, 9, and 20 (the original McNuggets pack sizes).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Frobenius

        public Frobenius()

    • Method Detail

      • isMcNugget

        public static boolean isMcNugget​(int value)
        Determines if value can be expressed as the sum of non-negative integral multiples of 6, 9, and 20 (the original McNuggets pack sizes).
        Parameters:
        value - target/goal number.
        Returns:
        true if value is a McNugget number using the original pack sizes (6, 9, and 20), false otherwise.

      • isGeneralMcNugget

        public static boolean isGeneralMcNugget​(int value,
                                        int[] packSizes)
        Determines if value can be expressed as the sum of non-negative integral multiples of the elements of packSizes. (If we invoke isGeneralMcNugget(value, new int[]{20, 9, 6}), the result returned should be identical to that returned by isMcNugget(value).
        Parameters:
        value - target/goal number.
        packSizes - array of distinct, positive int pack sizes, in descending order.
        Returns:
        true if value is a McNugget number using the specific pack sizes, false otherwise.
